channel.title: Ubuntu Network Configuration :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Note This video was recorded on Ubuntu 18.04, but nothing significant has changed in Ubuntu 24.04. –Russ Resources How to Configure Static IP Address on Ubuntu 20.04 Focal Fossa Desktop/Server from LinuxConfig.org Network Configuration from Ubuntu Server Guide ip Command Cheat Sheet from Red Hat Even though it is for Red Hat, most of these commands should also work in Ubuntu, and honestly, it is just a really handy cheat sheet to have! 12 ip Command Examples for Linux Users from Linuxtechi How to Use IPRoute2 Tools to Manage Network Configuration on a Linux VPS from DigitalOcean How to Use Traceroute and MTR to Diagnose Network Issues from DigitalOcean An Introduction to the ss Command from The Linux Foundation 10 Examples of Linux ss Command to Monitor Network Connections from BinaryTides Video Transcript Now, let’s look at how to manage and configure a network connection in Ubuntu 18.04.
